archimate:Requirement.name: BA.2.3.6d: d) using only approved versions of databases (e.g. using the current database version and an approved database program, such as Microsoft Access, Filemaker or OpenOffice Base).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
